summary: The Veterans Health Administration has designated patient advocates at each VA medical center to receive and document feedback from veterans. Amid concerns about veterans’ ability to receive timely and quality care, we reviewed the VHA patient advocacy program. We found that VHA is beginning to address governance, staffing, training, and other issues, including directing a workgroup to provide recommendations by spring of 2018. However, the...
title: VA Health Care: Improved Guidance and Oversight Needed for the Patient Advocacy Program
